hero.title: move fast and securely with the password manager trusted by millions.
hero.description: Say goodbye to memorizing passwords. Let us do it for you. PSMis a secure password manager that safely manages your passwords and autofills them across websites and applications.

sections.title: Save information with a click
sections.description: Still using sticky notes to remember your sensitive info? Let PSM save it instead. Manage passwords, passkeys, credit cards, and personal information in a single secure place.

sections.title: Autofill passwords, credit cards, and more
sections.description: Shopping online? Booking a trip? Logging in to Twitter? Use the PSM password manager to autofill forms, credit card details, and passwords with a click.

sections.title: Share securely
sections.description: Need to share work-related passwords, company payment info, or Wi-Fi access? Do so swiftly and securely with PSM. Plain text was not made for secrets.

tabs.label: Monitor breaches
tabs.description: Stay focused on what matters and let PSM monitor your company accounts and emails for data breaches. Get real-time notifications in case of an emergency.

tabs.label: Company-wide settings
tabs.description: Enforce company-wide password policies or manage access privileges across the organization with PSMBusiness.

tabs.label: Access Management
tabs.description: Save time. Onboard new members to the organization smoothly and securely. Effortlessly give, remove, or reassign access privileges.
